title: Skepticism grows over DR Congo-Rwanda peace deal
description: Washington hails a "historic" US-brokered Rwanda-DR Congo peace deal, but renewed clashes, mistrust between leaders, and warnings of US mineral ambitions reveal a fragile reality on the ground.
content: The ink is barely dry on the US-brokered peace agreement between Rwanda and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), but reactions reveal skepticism over whether the deal can deliver anything resembli… [+6291 chars]
